original: Elon Musk banned Twitter accounts that were publishing information about flights on his private jet (which he compared to being doxxed), but by blocking these accounts and the accounts of journalists that repeated the information, he drew even more attention to the issue.
simplified: Elon Musk did not want people to know about the flights on his private jet, so he blocked the Twitter accounts that shared this information. || However, by doing this, he actually drew more attention to the issue.
